value: まだサインアップしていません。サインアップリンクをメールで送信しました。
reference value: You haven't signed up yet. We've sent the sign up link to your email.
description: You haven't signed up yet. We've sent the sign up link to your email.

value: バックアップ支払い方法としてマークされていない%{payment_method}。
reference value: Unmarked %{payment_method} as Backup payment method.
description: after removing the tag to the payment method as Backup. eg: Unmarked Visa (...4444) as Backup payment method.

value: このメールアドレスを使用して、カスタマーポータルアカウントをすでに設定しています。こちらからログインしてください。
reference value: You've already setup your customer portal account using this email address. Please login here.
description: You've already setup your customer portal account using this email address. Please login here.

value: %{payment_method}の詳細が更新されました。
reference value: %{payment_method} details have been updated.
description: after the card details have been updated. eg: Visa (...4444) details have been updated.

value: この銀行口座の確認の最大試行回数を超えました
reference value: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts to verify this bank account
description: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts to verify this bank account

value: メールアドレスを確認していません。別の確認メールがアカウントに送信されました。ログインするには、メールIDを確認する必要があります。
reference value: You haven't verified your email. Another verfication email has been sent to your account. You need to verify your email ID to login.
description: You haven't verified your email. Another verfication email has been sent to your account. You need to verify your email ID to login.

value: この電子メールIDを使用してサブスクライブした場合は、パスワードのリセット手順が表示されます。
reference value: You will receive the password reset instructions if you have subscribed using this email ID.
description: You will receive the password reset instructions if you have subscribed using this email ID.

value: URLが期限切れか無効のようです。別のリンクをリクエストするには、メールアドレスを入力してください。
reference value: The URL appears to be either expired or invalid. Please enter your email address to request another link.
description: The URL appears to be either expired or invalid. Please enter your email address to request another link.

value: サインアップはまだ完了していません。メールへの登録リンクを再送しました。
reference value: You haven't completed your sign up yet. We've resent the sign up link to your email.
description: You haven't completed your sign up yet. We've resent the sign up link to your email.

value: パスワードが正常に変更されました。
reference value: Your password has been changed successfully.
description: Your password has been changed successfully.

value: %{payment_method}が支払い方法として追加されました
reference value: %{payment_method} added as a payment method
description: after the card details have been added. eg: Visa (...4444) added as a payment method.

value: アカウントの確認に成功しました。ここでログイン。
reference value: You have successfully verified your account. Login here.
description: You have successfully verified your account. Login here.

value: 配送先住所の詳細が正常に更新されました。
reference value: Successfully updated your shipping address details.
description: Successfully updated your shipping address details.

value: 請求先住所の詳細が正常に更新されました。
reference value: Successfully updated your billing address details.
description: Successfully updated your billing address details.

value: サブスクリプションが正常にキャンセルされ、クレジットカードが削除されました。
reference value: Successfully canceled your subscription and your credit card removed.
description: Successfully canceled your subscription and your credit card removed.

value: サブスクリプションを正常にキャンセルしました。
reference value: Successfully canceled your subscription.
description: Successfully canceled your subscription.

value: %{payment_method}が削除されました。
reference value: %{payment_method} deleted.
description: Deleting a payment method. eg: Visa (...4444) deleted.

value: すでにカスタマーポータルを設定しています。確認メールが送信されました。メールアドレスを確認してログインしてみてください。
reference value: You've already setup your customer portal. A verification email has been sent. Please verify your email address and try logging in.
description: You've already setup your customer portal. A verification email has been sent. Please verify your email address and try logging in.

value: %{payment_method}がプライマリ支払い方法としてマークされています。
reference value: %{payment_method} marked as Primary payment method.
description: after associating a tag to the payment method as Primary. eg: Visa (...4444) marked as Primary payment method.

value: サブスクリプションが正常に更新されました。
reference value: Successfully updated your subscription.
description: Successfully updated your subscription.

value: アカウントの詳細が正常に更新されました。
reference value: Successfully updated your account details.
description: Successfully updated your account details.

value: パスワードの有効期限が切れています。こちらで変更してください。
reference value: Your password has expired. Please change it here.
description: Your password has expired. Please change it here.

value: 成功：パスワードがリセットされました！ここでログイン。
reference value: Success: Your password has been reset! Login here.
description: Success: Your password has been reset! Login here.

value: サインアップを完了するための手順が記載されたメールを送信しました。
reference value: We've sent an email with instructions to complete your sign up.
description: We've sent an email with instructions to complete your sign up.

value: %{payment_method}はバックアップ支払い方法としてマークされています。
reference value: %{payment_method} marked as Backup payment method.
description: after associating a tag to the payment method as Backup. eg: Visa (...4444) marked as Backup payment method.

value: 銀行口座は正常に確認されました。
reference value: The bank account is successfully verified.
description: The bank account is successfully verified.
